trans-unit.source: A data bound list control that displays the items from data source in a table.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結清單控制項顯示資料表中的項目從資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid control allows you to select, sort, and edit these items.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 控制項可讓您選取、 排序和編輯這些項目。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) > [!NOTE] > Before you use the DataGrid control, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control instead.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#Introduction) - [協助工具](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法](#DeclarativeSyntax) > [!NOTE] > 使用 DataGrid 控制項之前，請考慮使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>改為控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, which was introduced in the .NET Framework version 2.0, is the successor to the DataGrid control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制.NET Framework 2.0 版中引進，是 DataGrid 控制項中的後續版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ## Introduction Use the DataGrid control to display the fields of a data source as columns in a table.
trans-unit.target: # # 簡介使用 DataGrid 控制項來顯示資料來源的欄位做為資料表中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Each row in the DataGrid control represents a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 控制項中的每個資料列代表資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid control supports selection, editing, deleting, paging, and sorting.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 控制項支援選取、 編輯、 刪除、 分頁和排序。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: Different column types determine the behavior of the columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: 不同的資料行類型可決定在控制項中的資料行的行為。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different column types that can be used.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的不同的資料行類型。

trans-unit.source: |Column Type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>|Displays a column bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: |資料行類型 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>|顯示資料行繫結至資料來源中的欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: It displays each item in the field as text.
trans-unit.target: 它會每個項目欄位中顯示為文字。

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type of the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>|Displays a command button for each item in the column.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設資料行的 DataGrid 控制項類型。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>|顯示資料行中的每個項目的命令按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as `Add` or `Remove` buttons.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>|Displays a column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>|Displays the contents of each item in the column as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立自訂按鈕控制項的資料行，例如`Add`或`Remove`按鈕。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>|資料行中每個項目的命令包含編輯的資料行的顯示。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>|顯示為超連結資料行中的每個項目的內容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source or static text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>|Displays each item in the column following a specified template.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的內容可以繫結至資料來源或靜態文字中的欄位。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>|將指定的範本資料行中顯示每個項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide custom controls in the column.| By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, which creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> object for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供的資料行中的自訂控制項。 | 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性設定為`true`，它會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>資料來源中的每個欄位的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each field is then rendered as a column in the DataGrid control in the order that each field appears in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 接著會將每個欄位轉譯為每個欄位會出現在資料來源的順序中的 DataGrid 控制項中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: You can also manually control which columns appear in the DataGrid control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `false` and then listing the columns that you want to include between the opening and closing `<Columns>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以手動可以控制哪些資料行出現在 DataGrid 控制項中設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性`false`然後列出您想要包含在開頭和結尾之間的資料行和`<Columns>`標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The columns specified are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the order listed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料行加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>集合的順序列出。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the columns in the DataGrid control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制的 DataGrid 控制項中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order that the columns are displayed in the DataGrid control is controlled by the order that the columns appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，DataGrid 控制項中顯示資料行的順序由資料行中出現的順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although you can programmatically change the order of the columns by manipulating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection, it is easier to list the columns in the desired display order.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以操作，以程式設計方式變更的資料行順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>集合，會比較容易在清單中所要的顯示順序的資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Explicitly declared columns can be displayed in conjunction with automatically generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 明確宣告的資料行可以顯示配合自動產生的資料行。

trans-unit.source: When using both, explicitly declared columns will be rendered first, followed by the automatically generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 當同時明確宣告資料行使用第一次呈現時，後面接著自動產生的資料行。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Automatically generated columns are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 自動產生的資料行不會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the DataGrid control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 可自訂的 DataGrid 控制項的外觀，藉由設定控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: |Style Property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for alternating items in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the item being edited in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the footer section in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the header section in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the items in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PagerStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the page selection section of the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the selected item in the DataGrid control.| You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: |樣式屬性 |描述 | |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>|指定替代 DataGrid 控制項中的項目樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>|指定正在編輯 DataGrid 控制項中項目的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A>|DataGrid 控制項中指定的樣式頁尾區段。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A>|DataGrid 控制項中指定的標頭區段的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>|DataGrid 控制項中指定之項目的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PagerStyle%2A>|指定頁面選取區段的 DataGrid 控制項的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>|DataGrid 控制項中指定的選取項目的樣式。 | 您也可以顯示或隱藏的控制項的不同部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PagerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可控制哪些部分要顯示或隱藏的屬性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A>|Shows or hides the footer section of the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowHeader%2A>|Shows or hides the header section of the DataGrid control.| You can control the appearance of the DataGrid control by programmatically adding attributes to the `<td>` and `<tr>` tags rendered by the control on the browser.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A>|顯示或隱藏的 DataGrid 控制項的頁尾區段。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowHeader%2A>|顯示或隱藏的 DataGrid 控制項的標頭區段。 | 您可以控制 DataGrid 控制項的外觀以程式設計方式將屬性加入`<td>`和`<tr>`由控制項的瀏覽器上呈現的標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attributes can be programmatically added by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemCreated%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemDataBound%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以藉由提供的事件處理常式中的程式碼以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemCreated%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemDataBound%2A>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemDataBound%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add an attribute to the `<td>` tag, first get the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object that represents the cell in the DataGrid control you want to add the attribute to.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入屬性至`<td>`標記中，先取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件，表示您想要加入至屬性的 DataGrid 控制項中的資料格。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> object passed into the event handler can be used to get the desired <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的物件可以用來取得想要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to add attributes to the `<td>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>屬性来加入的物件`<td>`標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To add an attribute to the `<tr>` tag, first get the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object that represents the row in the DataGrid control you want to add the attribute to.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入屬性至`<tr>`標記中，先取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>物件，表示您想要加入至屬性的 DataGrid 控制項中的資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> object passed into the event handler can be used to get the desired <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的物件可以用來取得想要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object to add attributes to the `<tr>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>屬性来加入的物件`<tr>`標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有關如何設定這個控制項，使其產生標記，並符合協助工具標準，協助工具的資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether custom paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用自訂分頁。

trans-unit.source: Paging allows you to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control in page segments.
trans-unit.target: 分頁可讓您顯示的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>頁面區段中的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The number of items on a page is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面上的項目數目由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> will display 10 items on a page.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何值，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>將顯示 10 個項目頁面上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Normally, a data source that contains every row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is loaded every time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control moves to a different page.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，包含每個資料列的資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>每次載入控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項移到不同的網頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This can consume a lot of resources when the data source is very large.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會非常大的資料來源時耗用大量資源。

trans-unit.source: Custom paging allows you to load just the segment of data needed to display a single page.
trans-unit.target: 自訂分頁可讓您只載入區段顯示在單一頁面所需的資料。

trans-unit.source: To enable custom paging, set both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A> and AllowCustomPaging properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用自訂分頁，同時設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A>和 AllowCustomPaging 屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, provide code to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，提供程式碼來處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The typical logic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event handler is to first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property to the index of the page you want to display.
trans-unit.target: 一般邏輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>事件處理常式會先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>屬性頁面，您想要顯示的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 事件處理常式會接收<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>物件做為參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> property of this parameter to determine the index of the page selected by the user from the page selection elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>此參數，以判斷頁面的頁面上選取項目從使用者選取的索引屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, create a data source that contains the data to display on a single page and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，建立資料來源包含要顯示在單一頁面上，然後使用資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法來將資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because only a segment of the data is loaded, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A> property to the total number of items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，因為載入的資料區段時，您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A>屬性中的項目總數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows the control to determine the total number of pages needed to display every item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓控制項來決定顯示在每個項目所需總頁數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This property is normally programmatically set once the total number of items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is determined.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常會以程式設計方式設定一次中的項目總數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制決定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled with the AllowCustomPaging property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control assumes that the data source contains all the items to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當啟用分頁以 AllowCustomPaging 屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項假設資料來源包含要顯示的所有項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control calculates the indexes of the items on the displayed page based on the page index, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property, and the number of items on a page, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項計算顯示根據指定的頁面索引的頁面上的項目索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>屬性，並在頁面上，所指定的項目數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: When the AllowCustomPaging property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control assumes that the data source only contains the items as determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當 AllowCustomPaging 屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項假設資料來源只包含的項目由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: All items up to the number of items specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 最多的項目所指定的所有項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>屬性會顯示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if custom paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用自訂分頁;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用分頁。

trans-unit.source: Paging allows you to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control in page segments.
trans-unit.target: 分頁可讓您顯示的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>頁面區段中的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The number of items on a page is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面上的項目數目由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will display 10 items on a page.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何值，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項將顯示 10 個項目頁面上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, paging is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會停用分頁。

trans-unit.source: To enable paging, set this property to `true` and provide code to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用分頁，將此屬性設定為`true`並提供程式碼來處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The typical logic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event is to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property to the index of the page you want to display and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般邏輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>事件是要設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>屬性顯示，然後使用您想要的頁面索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法來將資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 事件處理常式會接收<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>物件做為參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> property of this parameter to determine the index of the page selected by the user from the page selection elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>此參數，以判斷頁面的頁面上選取項目從使用者選取的索引屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: With standard paging, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control assumes that the data source contains all the items to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用標準的分頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項假設資料來源包含要顯示的所有項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control calculates the indexes of the items on the displayed page based on the page index, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property, and the number of items of items on a page, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項計算顯示根據指定的頁面索引的頁面上的項目索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>屬性，並在頁面上，所指定項目的項目數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Normally, a data source that contains all items to be displayed is loaded every time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is paged.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，資料來源，其中包含要顯示的所有項目會載入每次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項被分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This can consume a lot of resources when the data source is very large.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會非常大的資料來源時耗用大量資源。

trans-unit.source: Custom paging allows you to load just the segment of data needed to display a single page.
trans-unit.target: 自訂分頁可讓您只載入區段顯示在單一頁面所需的資料。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on custom paging, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關自訂分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用分頁。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether sorting is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用排序。

trans-unit.source: When sorting is enabled, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls are rendered in the heading section of each column where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 啟用排序時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制項以每個資料行的標題區段轉譯其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls allow you to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control by the selected column.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制項可讓您排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項的選取資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: The only exception is when you use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn> column type with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A> property set.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的例外是當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>資料行類型與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性集。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must provide a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A> of the column.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A>資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event is raised when one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>時，就會引發事件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>

trans-unit.source: It is up to you to provide code for the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 這是由您提供的事件處理常式程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The typical logic for the handler is to sort the list, and then rebind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式的一般邏輯是排序的清單，然後重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sorting is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用排序。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 替代項目中的取得的樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternatingItemStyle property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AlternatingItemStyle 屬性來提供的自訂樣式中的交替項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>屬性，所有其他項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項也會有紅色字型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the AlternatingItemStyle property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型 AlternatingItemStyle 屬性，覆寫紅色字型中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|AlternatingItemStyle| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: |優先順序 |樣式屬性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; |AlternatingItemStyle | |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定自訂樣式替代項目，加上`<AlternatingItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<AlternatingItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that represents the style properties for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>中的項目物件，表示替代的樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref> objects are automatically created and displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>物件會自動建立並顯示在<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>資料來源中的每個欄位的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to automatically create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> object for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>資料來源中的每個欄位的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: Each field is then rendered as a column in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control in the order that the fields appear in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 每個欄位然後會轉譯為中的資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>順序欄位出現在資料來源控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Not all data types can be bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有的資料型別可以繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: If a field contains an unsupported data type, a column is not created for that field.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位包含不支援的資料類型，該欄位將不會建立資料行。

trans-unit.source: If the data source only contains one column with an unsupported data type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源只包含一個資料行具有不支援的資料類型，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the data types that can be bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示可以繫結至控制項的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: |Data Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Primitives|A primitive data type, such as <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Double>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: |資料型別 |描述 | |---------------|-----------------| |基本型別 |基本資料類型，例如<xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Char>， <xref:System.Double>，依此類推。</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Char> </xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.| |String|A <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> object.| |DateTime|A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.| |Decimal|A <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName> object.| > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared columns may be used in conjunction with auto-generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整清單，請參閱<xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。 | |字串 |<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>物件。 | |DateTime |<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>物件。 | |十進位 |<xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName>物件。 | > [!NOTE] > 明確宣告資料行可用於搭配自動產生的資料行。</xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When using both, explicitly declared columns will be rendered first, followed by the auto-generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 當同時明確宣告資料行使用第一次呈現時，後面接著自動產生的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Auto-generated columns are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的資料行不會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref> objects are automatically created and displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>物件是自動建立和顯示，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display in the background of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在背景中顯示的影像 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the BackImageUrl property to specify an image to display in the background of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BackImageUrl 屬性來指定要在背景中顯示的影像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified image is smaller than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, the image will tile to fill in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 小於指定的映像是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>影像會並排控制項，以填滿控制項的背景。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image to display in the background of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要在背景中顯示的影像 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref> button is clicked for an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref>按鈕中的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The CancelCommand event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: CancelCommand 引發時`Cancel`按鈕中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the CancelCommand event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: CancelCommand 事件集的一般處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性`-1`（若要取消選取的項目） 並再重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的值是來自使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref> command name.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref>命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the CancelCommandName field to represent the `Cancel` command name.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CancelCommandName 欄位來代表`Cancel`命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that represent the columns of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，表示的資料行的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically control the collection of columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的資料行集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The Columns collection contains explicitly declared columns that get rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料行集合包含明確宣告的資料行，以取得轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared columns may be used in conjunction with automatically generated columns.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 明確宣告的資料行可用於搭配自動產生的資料行。

trans-unit.source: When using both, explicitly declared columns will be rendered first, followed by the automatically generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 當同時明確宣告資料行使用第一次呈現時，後面接著自動產生的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated columns are not added to the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的資料行不會加入至資料行集合。

trans-unit.source: The order that the columns are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is controlled by the order that the columns appear in the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料行中所顯示的順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項由資料行的資料行集合中出現的順序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different column classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn> class and can be used in the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示不同的資料行類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>類別，並可用於資料行集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: |Column type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>|Displays a column bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: |資料行類型 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>|顯示資料行繫結至資料來源中的欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: It displays each item in the field as text.
trans-unit.target: 它會每個項目欄位中顯示為文字。

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>|Displays a command button for each item in the column.
trans-unit.target: 這是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項的預設資料行類型。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>|顯示資料行中的每個項目的命令按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the `Add` or `Remove` button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>|Displays a column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>|Displays the contents of each item in the column as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立自訂按鈕控制項的資料行，例如`Add`或`Remove` 按鈕。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>|資料行中每個項目的命令包含編輯的資料行的顯示。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>|顯示為超連結資料行中的每個項目的內容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source or static text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>|Displays each item in the column following a specified template.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的內容可以繫結至資料來源或靜態文字中的欄位。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>|將指定的範本資料行中顯示每個項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide custom controls in the column.| > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to the Columns collection, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to show or hide the column.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供的資料行中的自訂控制項。 | > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以程式設計方式加入資料行，資料行集合，會比較容易以靜態方式列出的資料行，然後使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>屬性，即可顯示或隱藏資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> object that contains a collection of objects that represent the columns of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>物件，其中包含的物件，表示的資料行集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of columns to be used to build up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 建立要用來在控制項階層架構的資料行集。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns*> is true, the columns are created to match the data source and are appended to the set of columns defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 當<> *> 為 true，資料行以符合資料來源建立並附加至資料行中定義一組<> *> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The data source being used to create the control hierarchy
trans-unit.target: 用來建立在控制項階層架構的資料來源

trans-unit.target: 是否要使用資料來源自動產生資料行，或使用已儲存的狀態。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> containing the effective set of columns in the right order.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref>包含正確的順序中的資料行的有效組。

trans-unit.target: 建立用來呈現的控制項階層架構<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation assumes that all the children in the controls collection have already been cleared.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會假設已經已清除控制項集合中的所有子系。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use the data source to generate columns automatically or to use saved state.
trans-unit.target: 是否要使用資料來源自動產生資料行，或使用已儲存的狀態。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前顯示的頁面的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the currently displayed page in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷目前顯示在頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制當啟用分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也用於以程式設計方式控制要顯示的頁面。

trans-unit.source: You can also hide the built in paging controls and create custom controls.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以隱藏內建的分頁控制項，並建立自訂控制項。

trans-unit.target: 若要顯示特定頁面，將此屬性設定為您想要顯示，然後重新繫結至資料的頁面索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.target: 按一下 [編輯] 按鈕中的項目時，會引發 EditCommand 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the EditCommand event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to the selected row and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: EditCommand 事件集的一般處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性，以選取的資料列，然後重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的值是來自使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Represents the Edit command name.
trans-unit.target: 表示編輯命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditCommandName field to represent the Edit command name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EditCommandName 欄位來代表編輯命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中的項目索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>来編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditItemIndex property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> to determine the index of the item selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: 使用處理這個事件屬性時的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>判斷索引的項目中選取的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項進行編輯。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This property is also used to programmatically control which item is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也用來以程式設計方式控制 正在編輯的項目。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to an index of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will enable editing controls for that item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為索引中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項可讓在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>該項目的編輯控制項</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>的項目

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The EditItemIndex property is zero based.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 處理這個事件的屬性是以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: To cancel editing, programmatically set this property to -1.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消編輯，以程式設計方式設定這個屬性為-1。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。

trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的值是來自使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。

trans-unit.source: The index of an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>来編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that no item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，這表示在任何項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引為小於-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties of the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性中進行編輯選取之項目的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditItemStyle property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EditItemStyle 屬性來提供的自訂樣式中進行編輯選取的項目的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>屬性，所有其他項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項也會有紅色字型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|EditItemStyle| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: |優先順序 |樣式屬性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |EditItemStyle | |&2; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定自訂樣式選取要編輯的項目，加上`<EditItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<EditItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<EditItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties of the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>物件，其中包含中進行編輯選取之項目的樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.target: InitializePager 方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>類別來建立頁面巡覽區列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span the pager.
trans-unit.target: 跨越頁面巡覽區的資料行數目。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"> </xref>包含頁面巡覽區的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下中的任何按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event is raised when any button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下中的任何按鈕時引發 ItemCommand 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle buttons controls with a custom CommandName value, such as Add, in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來處理按鈕控制項的自訂 CommandName 值，例如 [新增]，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
